docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs ¶ For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands (test 1) ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout ¶ mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Annotations to code ¶ theme : features : - content.code.annotate # (1) I'm a code annotation! I can contain code , formatted text , images, ... basically anything that can be written in Markdown. Line numbers ¶ 1 2 3 4 5 def bubble_sort ( items ): for i in range ( len ( items )): for j in range ( len ( items ) - 1 - i ): if items [ j ] > items [ j + 1 ]: items [ j ], items [ j + 1 ] = items [ j + 1 ], items [ j ] Highlight lines ¶ def bubble_sort ( items ): for i in range ( len ( items )): for j in range ( len ( items ) - 1 - i ): if items [ j ] > items [ j + 1 ]: items [ j ], items [ j + 1 ] = items [ j + 1 ], items [ j ]
docs.title: Code Blocks

docs.text: Example Unordered List Ordered List * Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum * Donec vitae suscipit est * Nulla tempor lobortis orci 1. Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum 2. Donec vitae suscipit est 3. Nulla tempor lobortis orci C C++ #include <stdio.h> int main ( void ) { printf ( "Hello world! \n " ); return 0 ; } #include <iostream> int main ( void ) { std :: cout << "Hello world!" << std :: endl ; return 0 ; }
